title: A Confused Boy
description:
The guys discover another politician rapping their way through a campaign. We revisit Jacob's night terrors and find out about Jay's confusing childhood feelings about Boy George.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
